channel.title: Andrey Polischuk
channel.description: Frontend engineer, spa, infrastructure, open source, help to make things better
channel.author: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: About to-do, schedule and planning
item.description: I don’t like a rigid planning. Caledars, reminders, scheduled events are not for me. But at the same time I want barely control things I want to do.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Protect the frontend
item.description: Modern web application uses a lot of resources: own scripts, styles, requests, url queries, external analytics, fonts and other stuff receiving from cdns. And each of them may be malicious under certain conditions.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Code without comments
item.description: Ideally code should be neat, clean and odorless. But in real world we everyday work with a mass of ugly and smelly commented code.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Personal should be a personal
item.description: We send messages by centralized messengers. We post thoughts by centralized blogs or socials. We sync personal photos by centralized clouds.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Latest tools
item.description: Sometimes I try to use new tools for experiment. And new are often better for me than old ones. Early I wrote about I started use Vim and still use it.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Why do I use Vim?
item.description: This article in vim Vim is amazing. I use it to write code, text notes, check lists. I use it to write this article. I use Vim everytime and everywhere.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Webpack with nginx upstreams
item.description: Currently I work on project containing a lot of applications. Each of them has its own structure and development process. And all of these applications have some requirements for dev enviroment.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk

item.title: Entry point
item.description: I’m Andrey Polischuk, a frontend engineer. This site is my first try to write about tech things.
item.dc:creator: Andrey Polischuk
